title: font from website
content:
Please, what is this font?

[http://www.bureau-inc.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016075633/http:/www.bureau-inc.com/ "http://www.bureau-inc.com/")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2013-03-15 at 4.33.43 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016075633/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-03-15%20at%204.33.43%20PM.png) | 23.48 KB |
author: girlsandboys

comments.content: That looks like [Monaco](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016075633/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1O2), a Mac system font. [Lucida Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016075633/http:/myfonts.us/e2w0fM) is a close alternative if you're not on a Mac.
